Albert Castner

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: John W. Reigle
  3. Location of Family: Madison, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Madison, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 4
  7. Date of Birth: 1904-08-02, Dresden, NY
  8. Gender: male
  9. Spouse Name: Mary Pharo
  10. Source: Madison Star-Mail, 27 November 1908; Find-A-Grave for Albert Castner.
